item.title: National, State Leaders Ask Indiana Senate To Stop Blocking Vote On Immigration Enforcement Bill
item.description: 'When Hoosiers went to the polls last November, they did not vote for half-measures or vague promises,' the America First letter tells Bray.

item.title: Yes, It’s Completely Constitutional For The U.S. Government To Promote Christianity
item.description: The states pushing legislation to display the Ten Commandments in public schools are all but guaranteed to end up at the Supreme Court.

item.title: FCC Is Finally Going After Corporate Media Hacks, And Democrats Are Outraged
item.description: The FCC chair is calling out the institutions that have gotten a free pass on their corruption and illegal DEI practices for too long.

item.title: It’s Time For Us All To Say, ‘Eff The F-Word’
item.description: I think it’s time to give Mr. F-word a little F-uneral, don’t you?

item.title: Racial Grievance Theater Is About Humiliation, Not History
item.description: Americans should be wary of all historical and political narratives that leverage racial grievance and victimhood.
